channel.title: NPC/ vengance help
channel.description:
2 things... i need help deleting some npc's on my server. im changing the places... and i dont need them... so im lost on how to get rid of only certin ones... and then the other one was my vengance wont work while in combat... i dont get it Roll Eyes
~Please post what info you have~
- Thanks, Gh0st Jr

item.title: NPC/ vengance help
item.dc:creator: @Ryanz Ryanz
item.description:
@Ryanz wrote:

[quote=“Gh0st Jr, post:1, topic:216627”]2 things… i need help deleting some npc’s on my server. im changing the places… and i dont need them… so im lost on how to get rid of only certin ones…
and then the other one was my vengance wont work while in combat… i dont get it Roll Eyes

~Please post what info you have~

  •   Thanks,
           Gh0st Jr[/quote]Npc's @ autospawn.cfg [just delete the lines] and you probably added the veng rong.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC/ vengance help
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

for deleting npc
find out the npc id
and go to autospawn.cfg
search for the id and remove the entire line
save+compile

Read full topic
